description.narrative: The Project is expected to have the following development impact: Private Sector Development: 1) the project supports the growth of an innovative successful local IT company; 2) the provision of cloud services in Russia will allow De Novo''s customers to reduce capex and operational costs freeing up cash to invest in their core business; and 3) IFC''s financing will help De Novo expand quicker in local and regional markets, as well as in high growth IT sub-sectors such as cloud services. Employment generation: New high-income jobs will be created due to the implementation of this project.

The Project will assist De Novo Overseas Holdings Limited (De Novo of the Company) to finance capital and operating requirements for the launch and development of cloud services in Russia over the next 9-12 months. De Novo is a 5-year old IT services company offering data center co-location services, managed hosting, cloud services, and IT systems/application management and integration to Ukrainian corporates with a focus on banks. De Novos datacenter is a 3 year old initiative being implemented in Kiev, Ukraine, by the Company, and is the first DC compliant to the Uptime Institutes TIA-942 standard and categorized as Tier III in Ukraine. De Novo was founded in 2008 by Mr. Maxim Ageyev, the former president of Kvazar-Micro, one of the largest information technology companies in Ukraine and the CIS region that was acquired by Sitronics (Russia) in 2004. The Company is headquartered in Kiev, employs 80 people and has a team of highly-qualified professionals with IT industry experience of over ten years.

mailing-address.narrative: De Novo 1-3 Severo-Syretskaya St 04136 Kiev, Ukraine Tel + 38 044 200 9339 Fax +38 044 200 9332 e-mail: mailto:maksym.ageev@de-novo.biz
Mr. Maxim Ageyev, CEO De Novo 1-3 Severo-Syretskaya St 04136 Kiev, Ukraine Tel +38 044 200 9339 Fax +38 044 200 9332 E-mail: mailto:maksym.ageev@de-novo.biz

name.narrative: De Novo has operations in Kiev, Ukraine. The operations of the Project will be located in Moscow, Russia.

activity-description.narrative: A description that qualifies the activity taking place at the location.

sector.narrative: R-BA - Computer Systems Design and Related Services (System Integration, Custom Computer Programming, IT Services etc.)
